name: Good boi, Puggo!
description:
When the hoomans ask who's a good boi, Puggo experiences a strangeness in his tail... Doubt! Who is the good boi? Puggo will find out.

Good boi, Puggo is an RPG (Roll, Pee, Glide) adventure game, with cool jumping. Gain back the bestest boi title by digging up bones, sniffing... everything, infuriating chats with the intruder cat (your friend), and general good boi stuff.

Explore the neighbourhood through the innocent eyes of a very agile Puggo. Fly like a hadeda and search for treasures! Bones are nomnomnom. But the bestest is when the hoomans give you love, and finally, once you've proven your truest nature, you will be a good boi!

This submission is part of the 72 hour SA Game Jam.
